name: Rewind (itch) (Retrisma)
description:
How To Play:

  • Click on a toy to begin playing!
  • Press "Z" for the yellow buttons, and "M" for the purple ones.
  • Don't run out of charge!

Credits:

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50: April 1-4 2022
